title: Turkey and leek frittata
ingredients: ['3 tbsp olive oil', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '2 leeks, trimmed and finely sliced', '25g stoned black olives, halved (optional)', '250g cooked turkey, diced', '100g cooked pasta shapes (such as fusilli or macaroni)', '6 eggs, beaten', '3 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '75g Gruy√®re or mature Cheddar, thinly sliced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
